* Alan Dean <alan.dean@...> [2009-02-24 07:05]:
> Your answer, whilst technically correct of course, is to some
> other question than that asked by Rama.

Indeed, I was not answering Rama’s question, and your answer was
correct. I simply felt that it was phrased such that it could be
read as having broader applicability than Rama’s question alone.
So I opted to clarify (rather than contradict) so as to avert any
such misreading.

Regards,
-- 
Aristotle Pagaltzis // <http://plasmasturm.org/>
